title: Him In My Heart, The World In My Hands - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: College/University   Female Protagonist   Short Story   Shy Characters
author: Nan Ye Lin’er   南野琳儿
description: Nothing was going right for her, a not-so-funny prank, phone hacks and computer viruses, fake emails and wasted work… every day was stifling, until she met him.>
